column5: Went out to my favourite local quarry this morning with my bro, joonmoon and our Alberta cuz, walleyeguy.   Joonmoon was the master of baby bass today catching this smallie.  And this largie on jig & grub and jig & powerleech.  Walleyeguy had a 2ft pike landed but by the time I got the camera out, it had wiggled away.  I lost a decent smallie on a jump and had to make due with half a dozen WGSF and the beautiful weather and warm water. Nice to get out again with walleyeguy and joonmoon. If I didn't have to go in to work at 3pm we'd probably still be out there.
Wow the water there looks pristine! Great report!
Great report and pics jediangler  No wonder you called it your favorite local quarry.....beautiful place Looks like you guys had a great time out there! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice pics...  I know exactly the quarry you were at...No security chase you out??? Did you see any of the 40 lbs. carp that cruise around in there like submarines???
No FnF, we didn't see the giant carp or any security. I think they only patrol on weekends once the kids get back to school.
Great Report.  It's always great to go fishing with family.
I got a 50 dollar trespassing fine there few weeks back LOL. officer was nice enough and chatted with us after giving us the ticket
